thread.section_title: Muscle Meals Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Muscle Meals Direct | musclemealsdirect.com.au
thread.title: Mark
thread.title_full: Muscle Meals Direct reviewed by Mark

author: Mark
title: Mark
text:
The meals I've had so far have unfortunately been disappointing, and "salmon fillet" was literally inedible (was like someone had emptied an out of date tin of salmon into a bag, bones and all). I understand it is for convenience and can't do much with reheated food though. I'm hopeful the meals I haven't tried are better but I'm reluctant to try, but I will.
I really hope the meals get better! It's a great idea, very convenient to have in the freezer and really not meant to be restaurant quality of course, fingers crossed for the remaining meals.
